name: projeto-te-liga-monorepo
description: Script runner para o projeto Te Liga (Frontend + Backend)

scripts.postinstall: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: echo 'Instalando dependencias do Backend...' && python -m pip install -r backend/requirements.txt
scripts.install:frontend: echo 'Instalando dependencias do Frontend...' && cd frontend && npm install
